name: canary

[ C ] a small, yellow bird that is well known for its singing, sometimes kept as a pet: She had a canary in a birdcage.
JuTi/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ U ] (also canary yellow [ C or U ]) a bright yellow colour: I don't know what compelled me to buy a blazer in a shocking shade of canary. This stylish toaster is available in in mint green, canary yellow, and lavender blue. Hot pinks, canary yellows, lime greens and electric blues give a jaunty air to his art.
